documents.document: @BenPhillipsUK I wish I could have a selfie with you, but I live so far away from you :(
@AmazingPhil @YouTube why do you always upload when I'm in the middle of doing my assignments?
It was nice and quiet in my house, I got a lot of work done..... then my brother came home and hasn't shut up and is annoying me.
I need an internet friend that also loves Dan and Phil.
How do people even get noticed by dan, I'm so unlucky that I'll never get noticed by any of my idols
It makes me sad when people say Phil is only famous because of dan
Phil is just such a lovely person, he's so under appreciated + over looked. He's a genuinely nice person and more people need to see that.
"It's good to be strange, normalness leads to sadness"
@danisnotonfire at least you didn't fall over on a bus full of people
I know I'm late but #HappyBirthdayHarry 🎁
Goodnight twitter. If I get time I'll tweet before college.
It's not even midnight here in the U.K. but #HappyBirthdayHarry is trending at number 3 worldwide! We really are the best!
Absolutely loved this game growing up! https://t.co/KoFZIZS2e5
@crazygirl7406 thanks Lin, at least someone understands
@narribo @safaridjh omg you're so lucky to have been noticed so many times!!
Errrr, people always try and piss me off
Oh how I love arguments 😒😐
I'm going to Florida in October! I can't wait!!
Deciding wether to get tumblr or not 🤔
#HappyBirthdayPhil Happy birthday to the wonderful @AmazingPhil !! Thank you for making me smile! Love you! 💞
The amount of Valentine's Day adverts and stuff out is depressing
Omg it's so weird to think about this. https://t.co/NnOnAEP15d
I wish I had a friendship like Dan and Phil
I'm going on a diet as of tomorrow, I'm fat, ugly and disgusting.
@AmazingPhil are you going to name it when it hatches?
@danisnotonfire my cat eats spiders, I think you need to hire my cat for a while 😂
Hi guys!!! I got a new phone and I'm so happy!!
I was listening to @AmazingPhil doing a live show whilst doing an assignment, it was amazing and I did quite a lot of work!
@JakeQuickenden omgggg Thank you so much for following me, it made my day x ❤️
Just 2 more days then I get my new phone.
Twitter goal: Reach 5k by summer.
Today has been eventful
@BenPhillipsUK me please ❤️
@BenPhillipsUK please?
I went into town today, didn't see that the automatic door was out of order and walked straight into it.
@BenPhillipsUK just finished watching it! Loved it!
I might be getting a new phone tomorrow. Which shall I get?
If there was a film about my life, it would end up on one of those try not to cringe challenges on YouTube, and I bet everyone would fail.
I look back at my past and all I do is cringe.
@Lucy_Tomlinson3 cmon it's not that bad. I'm so much nicer once you know me. And also much more awkward.
So many people are scared of me because of my resting bitch face
I wish I could have gone out and marched today.
#WomensMarch this is amazing! I'm so proud of everyone marching today! Together we will fight.
Going on a diet tomorrow, need to lose weight.
@GeorgeSaviSav I did it earlier as well when I was messaging my mum.
Don't you just hate it when you send a message then realise ten minutes later that it has a typo in.
@BenPhillipsUK thank you Ben for making great videos that make me smile.
@GeorgeSaviSav oh right ok, I find if I don't use a proper glass wipe it makes it worse.
@GeorgeSaviSav I lost my cloth that came with my glasses
Don't you just hate it when your glasses are dirty and you don't have anything to clean them with.
@GeorgeSaviSav @AshDubh the key to success is to never give up, and keep doing what you're passionate about.
This is fucking disgusting!! Do not watch this! Absolutely disgusting. Stupid twats how would they like it. https://t.co/XvWgkUfyJE
@BenPhillipsUK I'm so sorry for your loss Ben, I know how it feels to lose someone who was close to me ❤️RIP
I thought I was the only one. https://t.co/F7PgatzraF
Me and my mum got into an argument earlier. I ended up crying and she came to me with a bar of chocolate and ice cream and apologised
I know right! Phil's hugs look so nice. It would be a dream to be hugged by them, it will never happen though. https://t.co/avlhAFcQCw
My neighbours are arguing again 😐🙄
@BenPhillipsUK you're not fat Ben. And you shouldn't let other people's opinions change who you are.
@BenPhillipsUK you can do it Ben! We know you can do it! We'll be here every step.
@BenPhillipsUK your tweets are inspiring me to go on a diet. We'll diet together.
Typos are ruining my life
I just noticed this has a typo. AGHHH I meant he's not yes https://t.co/8IfBetVaEb
I just realised Valentine's Day is coming up soon, another year all alone.
My friends dog jumped at me the other day and yes the same height as me, wtf.
I need more Dan and Phil merch but I have no money 😭
Yessssss please! https://t.co/BCn0xu1tqv
Remember to vote! #BRITVIDONEDIRECTION https://t.co/0XsRRU7JgK
My best friend got a boyfriend. Meanwhile all I have is a rabbit.
I needs more internet buddies. So if you love 1D, Dan and Phil and animals, say hi!
Hi guys sorry I'm inactive
@danisnotonfire will you ever reply to my tweets?
@danisnotonfire I can't watch the new video, can you sum it up for me?
@AmazingPhil I was trying to get the filter to work on my rabbit earlier but it didn't work so this is the picture… https://t.co/3JRCbPpW34
I miss Louis and the boys so much :(
It's starting to frost outside
It snowed briefly here today but I want a massive flurry and for it to settle
RT this tweet if you love Dan and Phil I'm looking for more internet friends 😊❤️
He's adorable, he needs to be appreciated more. https://t.co/P4ze1zXdXh
I need more internet friends that also love Dan and Phil.
@starlightlestr happy birthday!! 🎁
You in a year and you randomly say this without saying hi or anything for a whole year
Someone who I haven't talked to in a year just randomly popped up to me and said "Louis is fit" like I know he is but I haven't spoke to
When you see that other people on your timeline have snow and you sit here like https://t.co/WskRFGOQtl
I can't even print a new one off, because only the lecturer has them.
What on earth am I gonna say to my lecturer when I hand my assignment in, with it burnt.
I dropped it and set fire to my college assignment brief sheet. Why did I get blessed with the clumsy gene.
Today I lit a candle to make the house smell nice (not that I can smell anything at the moment) and I tried to put it in a candle holder
My neighbours have finally shut up so I'm off to sleep again, goodnight!
So then we started talking about Britain and Greece and I taught him a little more English and in return he taught me some Greek.
I remember when I went to Greece and this Greek lad (who spoke a little English) said hey so I said hey back and he said omg you're British
Well I'm awake again because my neighbour just started shouting at nearly 2:30 am seriously.
@Larry0Gaming go listen to it, it's a great song trust me.
@Larry0Gaming lyrics from Louis Tomlinson - Just Hold On
@Larry0Gaming they're lyrics.
'What do you do when a chapter ends, do you close the book and never read it again'
Omg my birthday is in late July, if this is true it will be the best birthday present. https://t.co/z8w6Szbj2B
It's impossible to not like one of @BenPhillipsUK 's videos.
11:11 @BenPhillipsUK follows me ❤️
This is such a beautiful quote. I'm getting this tattooed next year. https://t.co/UCQKAifj6L
@Larry0Gaming Italy would be nice to be honest, I love Italian food.
